## Melbourne  `r format(Sys.time(), '%d %b %Y')`

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
anzIcon <- makeIcon(
  iconUrl = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ckushaan/Leaflet/gh-pages/anzLogo.png",
  iconWidth = 38, iconHeight = 38,
  iconAnchorX = 31, iconAnchorY = 16
)
anzMelLatLong <- data.frame(
  lat = c(-37.8140996, -37.8122457, -37.8161233, -37.8165550, -37.8103280, -37.8218039),
  lng = c(144.9717892, 144.9654298, 144.9643191, 144.9618201, 144.9612290, 144.9454881))

anzSites <- c(
  "<a href='https://www.anz.com.au/personal/'>ANZ 55 Collins St</a>",
  "<a href='https://www.anz.com.au/personal/'>ANZ 230 Swanston St</a>",
  "<a href='https://www.anz.com.au/personal/'>ANZ 293 Collins St</a>",
  "<a href='https://www.anz.com.au/personal/'>ANZ 388 Collins St</a>",
  "<a href='https://www.anz.com.au/personal/'>ANZ 353 Elizabeth St</a>",
  "<a href='https://www.anz.com.au/personal/'>ANZ 833 Collins St</a>"
)
anzMelLatLong %>% 
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(icon = anzIcon, popup = anzSites)
```
